title: The Coder's Corner
description: The Coder's Corner is a social media website geared towards helping web developers to network, learn, and collaborate with one another. The site includes a newsfeed, discussion posts, public chat, and built-in code editor.

title: Google Books Search
description: This web application allows a user to search the Google Books API. Results display title, author, description, info links, and an option to save to a collection. This collection can be viewed and edited in a separate tab.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: This fitness tracker allows a user to create and save workouts. This data is stored and can be viewed graphically on the dashboard.
